statements: SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data;
SELECT diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM patient_data WHERE age > 50;
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patient_data ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT patient_name, gender, age, treatment_plan FROM patient_data WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%' OR diagnosis LIKE '%diabetes%' ORDER BY patient_id
SELECT patient_name, gender, treatment_plan FROM patient_data WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40 ORDER BY patient_id
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM patient_data WHERE gender='Female' AND treatment_plan IS NOT NULL ORDER BY age
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender, city FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, city FROM Patients WHERE city LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT record_id, doctor_name, diagnosis FROM MedicalRecords WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 40;
SELECT patient_name, city FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE appointment_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT doctor_name, count(*) as record_count FROM MedicalRecords GROUP BY doctor_name;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%infection%';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, age, address FROM Patients WHERE age <= 30;
SELECT * FROM Appointments ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, doctor_name FROM Appointments WHERE doctor_name='Dr. Smith' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' OR diagnosis LIKE '%cold%';
SELECT patient_name, age, address FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time, appointment_type FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty, doctor_expertise_area FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_specialty ASC;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY patient_id;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM doctors WHERE doctor_expertise_area = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY doctor_name;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_type = 'Check-up' ORDER BY appointment_date, appointment_time;

SELECT patient_name, appointment_date, diagnosis FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' AND appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM Visits ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, hospital_name FROM Doctors WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT * FROM Medications WHERE side_effects IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT doctor_name, hospital_name FROM Doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM Visits WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
